name: trigger fingers (tygutowski, Joph, Michael)
description:
Overview

You're looking to cybernetically augment yourself! Pick up upgrades and choose your favorite, but beware: Whichever upgrades you don't pick, the boss gets!

Infinitely scale yourself while also fighting against scaling enemies!

Controls

LMB - Shoot

RMB / R - Reload

WASD - Movement

F - Skip current floor in case of poor generation (Will increment difficulty)
